mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_idx, member_idx, title, content, reg_date, view_count) VALUES (seq_notice_idx.nextval, #{member_idx}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_idx, title, reg_date, view_count FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(notice pk_notice) */ rownum rn, notice_idx, title, reg_date, view_count FROM notice WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(notice pk_notice) */ notice_idx, title, reg_date, view_count FROM notice
SELECT notice_idx, member_idx, title, content, reg_date, view_count FROM notice WHERE notice_idx = #{notice_idx}
SELECT count(*) FROM notice WHERE notice_idx > 0
